GR14caitcanu:0: There are two numbering systems for this text. The material is
GR14caitcanu:1: sometimes organized into twelve themes and numbered accordingly.
GR14caitcanu:2: Those numbers are given in brackets. The editions used were:
GR14caitcanu:8: Texts without an alternative number are not found in either one of
GR14caitcanu:9: the editions. No attempt has been made to provide alternative readings.
GR14caitcanu:14: sarvair āmnāya-cūḍāmaṇibhir api na saṃlakṣyate yat svarūpaṃ
GR14caitcanu:17: śrīmac-caitanya-candraḥ sa kim u mama girāṃ gocaraś cetaso vā //2// (137)
GR14caitcanu:18: dharme niṣṭhāṃ dadhad anupamāṃ viṣṇu-bhaktiṃ gariṣṭhāṃ
GR14caitcanu:20: nīco goghrād api jagad aho plāvayaty aśru-pūraiḥ
GR14caitcanu:21: ko vā jānāty ahaha gahanaṃ heama-gaurāṅga-raṅgam //3// (127)
GR14caitcanu:23: dṛṣṭiṃ prāpto na hi khalu satāṃ sṛṣṭiṣu kvāpi no san /
GR14caitcanu:25: ty uccair gāyaty atha viluṭhati staumi taṃ kañcid īśam //4// (2)
GR14caitcanu:27: parītānāṃ pāpair api purubhir eṣāṃ tanu-bhṛtām /
GR14caitcanu:28: aho vajra-prāyaṃ hṛd api navanītāyitam abhūn
GR14caitcanu:29: nṝṇāṃ yasmin loke'vatarati sa gauro mama gatiḥ //5// (110)
GR14caitcanu:30: na yogo na dhyānaṃ na ca japa-tapas-tyāga-niyamā
GR14caitcanu:31: na vedā nācāraḥ kva nu bata niṣiddhādy-uparatiḥ /
GR14caitcanu:33: pumarthānāṃ mauliṃ param iha mudā luṇṭhati janaḥ //6// (111)
GR14caitcanu:34: yan nāptaṃ karma-niṣṭhair na ca samadhigataṃ yat tapo-dhyāna-yogai-
GR14caitcanu:35: rvairāgyais tyāga-tattva-stutibhir api na yat tarkitaṃ cāpi kaiścit /
GR14caitcanu:36: govinda-prema-bhājām api na ca kalitaṃ yad-rahasyaṃ svayaṃ tan-
GR14caitcanu:37: nāmnaiva prādurāsīd avatarati pare yatra taṃ naumi gauram //7// (3)
GR14caitcanu:39: kriyāsaktān dhig dhig vikaḍa-tapaso dhik ca yaminaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:41: na keṣāṃcil leśo'py ahaha milito gaura-madhunaḥ //8// (32)
GR14caitcanu:44: aśru-snāta-mukhaḥ svam eva hi jagannāthaṃ didṛkṣur gatā-
GR14caitcanu:45: yātair gaura-tanur vilocana-mudaṃ tanvan hariḥ pātu vaḥ //9// (16)
GR14caitcanu:47: lāṅgūlaṃ saramāpater vivṛṇataḥ syād asya naivārjavam /
GR14caitcanu:48: hastāv unnayatā budhāḥ katham aho dhāryaṃ vidhor maṇḍalaṃ
GR14caitcanu:49: sarvaṃ sādhanam astu gaura-karuṇābhāve na bhāvotsavaḥ //10// (36)
GR14caitcanu:53: gauro devaḥ sa jīyān praṇaya-rasa-pade darśitāś carya-koṭiḥ //11// (101)
GR14caitcanu:54: premā nāmādbhutārthaḥ śravaṇa-patha-gataḥ kasya nāmnāṃ mahimnaḥ
GR14caitcanu:71: ekībhūtaṃ vapur avatu vo rādhayā mādhavasya //16// (13)
GR14caitcanu:75: āścaryaṃ lavaṇoda-rodhasi paraṃ brahma svayaṃ nṛtyati //17// (131)
GR14caitcanu:81: suprakāśita-ratnaughe yo dīno dīna eva saḥ //19// (34)
GR14caitcanu:85: kim api rasa-rahasyaṃ dhāma gauraṃ namasyam //20// (58)
GR14caitcanu:86: niṣṭhāṃ prāptā vyavahṛti-tatir laukikī vaidikī yā
GR14caitcanu:89: gauraś cauraḥ sakalam aharat ko'pi me tīvra-vīryaḥ //21// (60)
GR14caitcanu:96: jñānābhyāsa-vidhiṃ jahuś ca yatayaś caitanya-candre parām
GR14caitcanu:98: bhrāntaṃ yatra munīśvarair api purā yasmin kṣamā-maṇḍale
GR14caitcanu:99: kasyāpi praviveśa naiva dhiṣaṇā yad veda no vā śukaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:100: yatra kvāpi kṛpāmayena ca nije'py udghāṭitaṃ śauriṇā
GR14caitcanu:103: dāsā bhavantu ca vidhāya harer upāsāḥ /
GR14caitcanu:109: yad vā bhāvaya tasya divya-madhuraṃ rūpaṃ jagan-mohanam /
GR14caitcanu:111: śrī-caitanya-mahāprabhor yadi kṛpā-dṛṣṭiḥ paten na tvayi //27// (82)
GR14caitcanu:112: bhūto vā bhavitāpi vā bhavati vā kasyāpi yaḥ ko'pi vā
GR14caitcanu:118: vāraṃ vāraṃ vraja-pati-guṇān gāya gāyeti jalpan
GR14caitcanu:119: gauro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛd api na yair durghaṭā teṣu bhaktiḥ //29// (38)
GR14caitcanu:126: śrī-bhaktiḥ kvacid ujjvalāpi ca harer vāṅ-mātra eva sthitā
GR14caitcanu:127: hā caitanya kuto gato'si padavī kutrāpi te nekṣyate //31// (138)
GR14caitcanu:128: vinā bījaṃ kiṃ nāṅkura-jananam andho'pi na kathaṃ
GR14caitcanu:129: prapaśyen no paṅgur giri-śikharam ārohati katham /
GR14caitcanu:131: py abhaktānāṃ bhāvī katham api para-prema-rabhasaḥ //32// (39)
GR14caitcanu:132: akasmād evaitad bhuvanam abhitaḥ plāvitam abhūn
GR14caitcanu:136: are mūḍhā gūḍhāṃ vicinuta harer bhakti-padavīṃ
GR14caitcanu:138: na viśrambhaś citte yadi yadi ca daurlabhyam iva tat
GR14caitcanu:140: tāvad brahma-kathā vimukta-padavī tāvan na tiktī-bhavet
GR14caitcanu:141: tāvac cāpi viśṛṅkhalatvam ayate no loka-veda-sthitiḥ /
GR14caitcanu:147: anaṅgaṃ gaurāṅgaṃ smaratu gata-saṅgaṃ mama manaḥ //36// (70)
GR14caitcanu:149: kvacid rādhāviṣṭo hari hari harīty ārta-ruditaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:150: kvacid riṅgan bālaḥ kvacid api ca gopāla-carito
GR14caitcanu:152: aye na kuru sāhasaṃ tava hasanti sarvodyamaṃ
GR14caitcanu:154: idaṃ tu nibhṛtaṃ śṛṇu praṇaya-vastu prastūyate
GR14caitcanu:155: yad eva nigameṣu tat patir ayaṃ hi gauraḥ param //38// (83)
GR14caitcanu:158: dvitrāṇy eva japanti kecana harer nāmāni vāmāśayāḥ
GR14caitcanu:159: pūrvaṃ samprati gauracandra udite premāpi sādhāraṇaḥ //39// (116)
GR14caitcanu:160: pāpīyān api hīna-jātir api duḥśīlo'pi duṣkarmaṇāṃ
GR14caitcanu:163: naṣṭo'py uddhṛta eva yena kṛpayā taṃ gauram eva stumaḥ //40// (78)
GR14caitcanu:164: acaitanyam idaṃ viśvaṃ yadi caitanyam īśvaram /
GR14caitcanu:165: na viduḥ sarva-śāstra-jñā hy api bhrāmyanti te janāḥ //41// (37)
GR14caitcanu:168: ko bālaḥ kaś ca vṛddhaḥ ka iha jaḍa-matiḥ ko budhaḥ ko varākaḥ
GR14caitcanu:169: sarveṣām aikarasyaṃ kim api hari-pade bhakti-bhājāṃ babhūva //42// (117)
GR14caitcanu:170: dattvā yaḥ kam api prasādam atha sambhāṣya smita-śrī-mukhaṃ
GR14caitcanu:171: dūrāt snigdha-dṛśā nirīkṣya ca mahā-premotsavaṃ yacchati /
GR14caitcanu:173: sākṣāt pūrṇa-rasāvatāriṇi harau duṣṭā amī kevalam //43// (45)
GR14caitcanu:174: kāśī-vāsān api na gaṇaye kiṃ gayāṃ mārgaye'haṃ
GR14caitcanu:175: muktiḥ śuktībhavati yadi me kaḥ parārtha-prasaṅgaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:176: trāsābhāsaḥ sphurati na mahā-raurave'pi kva bhītiḥ
GR14caitcanu:177: strī-putrādau yadi kṛpayate deva-devaḥ sa gauraḥ //44// (99)
GR14caitcanu:181: mūrtiḥ kācana kāñcana-drava-mayī cittāya me rocate //45// (129)
GR14caitcanu:182: dṛṣṭvā mādyati nūtanāmbuda-cayaṃ saṃvīkṣya barhaṃ bhaved
GR14caitcanu:183: atyantaṃ vikalo vilokya valitāṃ guñjāvalīṃ vepate /
GR14caitcanu:185: itthaṃ gaura-tanuḥ pracārita-nija-premā hariḥ pātu vaḥ //46// (14)
GR14caitcanu:189: gauraṃ vinādya mama ko bhaviteha bandhuḥ //47// (51)
GR14caitcanu:198: kva tāvad vairāgyaṃ kva ca viṣaya-vārtāsu narake-
GR14caitcanu:200: kva tat tejo vālaukikam atha mahā-bhakti-padavī
GR14caitcanu:201: kva sā vā sambhāvyā yad avakalitaṃ gaura-gatiṣu //50// (20)
GR14caitcanu:204: mahā-premāveśāt kim api naṭanām unmada iva
GR14caitcanu:206: sarve nārada-śaṅkarādaya ihāyātāḥ svayaṃ śrīr api
GR14caitcanu:207: prāptā deva-halāyudho'pi milito jātāś ca te vṛṣṇayaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:216: mahāścaryaṃ premotsavam api haḍhād dātari na yan
GR14caitcanu:217: matir gaure sākṣāt para iha sa mūḍho nara-paśuḥ //54// (40)
GR14caitcanu:219: prabhāvaṃ kaḥ sambhāvayatu param īśād itarataḥ /
GR14caitcanu:220: kim anyat mat-preṣṭhe kati kati satāṃ nāpy anubhavās
GR14caitcanu:221: tathāpi śrī-gaure hari hari na mūḍhā hari-dhiyaḥ //55// (41)
GR14caitcanu:223: mārgo vā prakaṭī-kṛtaḥ kiyad idaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādikaṃ vā kiyat /
GR14caitcanu:225: bhakter vartma-karīṃ parāṃ bhagavataś caitanya-mūrtiṃ stumaḥ //56// (7)
GR14caitcanu:228: nāsau vedeṣu gūḍho jagati yadi bhaved īśvaro gauracandras
GR14caitcanu:229: tat-prāpto'nīśa-vādaḥ śiva śiva gahane viṣṇu-māye namaste //57// (42)
GR14caitcanu:232: vaikuṇṭhādi-padaṃ svayaṃ ca militaṃ no me mano lipsate
GR14caitcanu:233: pādāmbhoja-rasa-cchaṭā yadi manāk gaurasya no rasyate //58// (65)
GR14caitcanu:243: rītiṃ na vedmi na ca sad-guravo milanti /
GR14caitcanu:244: hā hanta hanta mama kaḥ śaraṇaṃ nigūḍha-
GR14caitcanu:245: gauro haris tava na karṇa-pathaṃ gato'sti //61// (84)
GR14caitcanu:250: vṛthāveśaṃ karmasv apanayata vārtām api manāk
GR14caitcanu:255: sadā yoṣid-vyāghryās trasata vitathaṃ thūtkuruta re /
GR14caitcanu:266: kva sā niraṅkuśa-kṛpā kva tad-vaibhavam adbhutam /
GR14caitcanu:267: kva sā vatsalatā śaure yādṛk gaure tavātmani //67// (56)
GR14caitcanu:276: āstāṃ nāma mahān mahān iti ravaḥ sarva-kṣamā-maṇḍale
GR14caitcanu:277: loke vā prakaṭāstu nāma mahatī siddhiś camatkāriṇī /
GR14caitcanu:279: ceto me bahumanyate nahi nahi śrī-gaura-bhaktiṃ vinā //70// (66)
GR14caitcanu:294: udañcad-romāñcair api ca paramā yasya suṣamā
GR14caitcanu:296: kandarpād api sundaraḥ surasarit-pūrād aho pāvanaḥ
GR14caitcanu:297: śītāṃśor api śītalaḥ sumadhuro mādhvīka-sārād api /
GR14caitcanu:298: dātā kalpa-mahīruhād api mahān snigdho jananyā api
GR14caitcanu:299: premṇā gaura-hariḥ kadā nu hṛdi me dhyātuḥ padaḥ dhāsyati //75// (72)
GR14caitcanu:301: dattvā dattvā svayam urudayo modayan viśvam etat /
GR14caitcanu:306: premṇaḥ sāraṃ dātum īśo ya ekaḥ
GR14caitcanu:312: kiṃ tāvad bata durgameṣu viphalaṃ yogādi-mārgeṣv aho
GR14caitcanu:316: hasanty uccair uccair ahaha kula-vadhvo'pi parito
GR14caitcanu:320: prāyaś caitanyam āsīd api sakala-vidāṃ neha pūrvaṃ yad eṣāṃ
GR14caitcanu:321: khaarvā sarvārtha-sāre'py akṛta nahi padaṃ kuṇṭhitā buddhi-vṛttiḥ /
GR14caitcanu:323: keṣāṃ nāsīd idānīṃ jagati karuṇayā gaura-candre'vatīrṇe //81// (121)
GR14caitcanu:327: sa kālaḥ kiṃ bhūyo'py ahaha parivartate madhuraḥ //82// (139)
GR14caitcanu:329: so'yaṃ śrī-puruṣottamo madhupates tāny eva nāmāni ca /
GR14caitcanu:330: no kutrāpi nirīkṣyate hari hari premotsavas tādṛśo
GR14caitcanu:331: hā caitanya kṛpā-nidhāna tava kiṃ vikṣe punar vaibhavam //83// (140)
GR14caitcanu:333: vimathya prāptaṃ syāt kim api paramaṃ sāram atulam /
GR14caitcanu:335: cchaṭā-spṛṣṭānāṃ tad vahati vikaṭām eva kaṭutām //84// (23)
GR14caitcanu:339: bhavanti kila sad-guṇā jagati gaura-bhājām amī //85// (24)
GR14caitcanu:344: aśrūṇāṃ kim api pravāha-nivahaiḥ kṣauṇīṃ puraḥ paṅkilī-
GR14caitcanu:347: gaurībhūya hariḥ svayaṃ vitanute rādhā-padābje ratim //87// (135)
GR14caitcanu:351: ceto'kasmān mama nija-pade gāḍham uptaṃ cakāra //88// (61)
GR14caitcanu:357: hāraṃ vakṣasi kuṇḍalaṃ śravaṇayor bibhrat pade nūpurau /
GR14caitcanu:359: pīḍaḥ krīḍati gaura-nāgara-varo nṛtyan nijair nāmabhiḥ //90// (132)
GR14caitcanu:366: audāryeṇa ca koṭi-koṭi-guṇitaṃ kalpa-drumaṃ hy alpayan
GR14caitcanu:367: gauro me hṛdi koṭi-koṭi-januṣāṃ bhāgyaiḥ padaṃ dhāsyati //92// (74)
GR14caitcanu:368: kṣaṇaṃ hasati roditi kṣaṇam atha kṣaṇaṃ mūrcchati
GR14caitcanu:369: kṣaṇaṃ luṭhati dhāvati kṣaṇam atha kṣaṇaṃ nṛtyati /
GR14caitcanu:372: kṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇaḥ pīnaḥ kṣaṇam ahaha sāśruḥ kṣaṇam atha
GR14caitcanu:373: kṣaṇaṃ smeraḥ śītaḥ kṣaṇam anala-taptaḥ kṣaṇaṃ api /
GR14caitcanu:374: kṣaṇaṃ dhāvan stabdhaḥ kṣaṇam adhika-jalpan kṣaṇam aho
GR14caitcanu:375: kṣaṇaṃ mūko gauraḥ sphuratu mama deho bhagavataḥ //94// (76)
GR14caitcanu:383: cchaṭābhis taṃ vande harim ahaha sannyāsa-kapaṭam //96// (12)
GR14caitcanu:391: ty āśrāntaṃ mama jalpato janir iyaṃ yāyād iti prārthaye //98// (67)
GR14caitcanu:395: dhik-kurvanti sca jñāna-karma-viduṣas taṃ gauram eva stumaḥ //99// (6)
GR14caitcanu:396: yo mārgo dura-śūnyo ya iha bata balat-kaṇṭako yo'tidurgo
GR14caitcanu:407: mano me vaikuṇṭhād api ca madhure dhāmni ramate //102// (62)
GR14caitcanu:412: yat tad vadantu śāstrāṇi yat tad vyākhyāntu tārkikāḥ /
GR14caitcanu:415: kṣauṇiṃ paṅkilayann aho viśadayann aṭṭāṭṭahāsair nabhaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:418: dhig astu kulam ujjvalaṃ dhig api vāgmitāṃ dhig yaśo
GR14caitcanu:419: dhig adhyayanam ākṛtiṃ nava-vayaḥ śriyaṃ cāpi dhik /
GR14caitcanu:424: yogābhyāsa-parāś ca santi bahavaḥ siddhā mahī-maṇḍale /
GR14caitcanu:426: ko vā gaura-kṛpāṃ vinādya jagati premonmado nṛtyatu //107// (98)
GR14caitcanu:437: atas taṃ dhyāyantu praṇaya-bharato yāntu śaraṇaṃ
GR14caitcanu:438: tam eva pronmattās tam iha kila gāyantu kṛtinaḥ //110// (89)
GR14caitcanu:443: pātrāpātra-vicāraṇaṃ na kurute na svaṃ paraṃ vīkṣate
GR14caitcanu:444: deyādeya-vimarśako na hi na vā kāla-pratīkṣaḥ prabhuḥ /
GR14caitcanu:446: datte bhakti-rasaṃ sa eva bhagavān gauraḥ paraṃ me gatiḥ //112// (77)
GR14caitcanu:447: kecid dāsyam avāpur uddhava-mukhāḥ ślāghyaṃ pare lebhire
GR14caitcanu:452: pūrvaṃ naikataratra ko'pi sudṛḍhaṃ viśvasta āsīj janaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:454: śruty-artho hari-bhaktir eva paramaḥ kair vā na nirdhāryate //114// (124)
GR14caitcanu:456: viśvaṃ gaura-rase magnaṃ sparśo'pi mama nābhavat //115// (46)
GR14caitcanu:460: kṛtāṅgās taṃ gauraṃ katham akṛta-puṇyaḥ praṇayatu //116// (44)
GR14caitcanu:461: kair vā sarva-pumartha-maulir akṛtāyāsair ihāsād ito
GR14caitcanu:463: hā hā dhig mama jīvitaṃ dhig api me vidyāṃ dhig apy āśramaṃ
GR14caitcanu:464: yad daurbhāgya-bharād aho mama na tad-sambandho-gandho'py abhūt //117// (47)
GR14caitcanu:472: kṛtvā ca kāku-śatam etad ahaṃ bravīmi /
GR14caitcanu:473: he sādhavaḥ sakalam eva vihāya dūrād
GR14caitcanu:475: patanti yadi siddhayaḥ karatale svayaṃ durlabhāḥ
GR14caitcanu:476: svayaṃ ca yadi sevakī-bhavitum āgatāḥ syuḥ surāḥ /
GR14caitcanu:477: kim anyad idam eva me yadi caturbhujaṃ syād vapus
GR14caitcanu:478: tathāpi na mano manāk calati gauracandrān mama //121// (64)
GR14caitcanu:479: aho na durlabhā muktir na ca bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā /
GR14caitcanu:481: so'py āścarya-mayaḥ prabhur nayanayor yan nābhavad gocaro
GR14caitcanu:482: yan nāsvādi hareḥ padāmbuja-rasas tad yad gataṃ tad gatam /
GR14caitcanu:483: etāvan mama tāvad astu jagatīṃ ye'dyāpy alaṅkurvate
GR14caitcanu:491: hā hā kva yāmi vikalaḥ kim ahaṃ karomi
GR14caitcanu:498: tattvānudhyāna-koṭir bhavatu bhavatu vā vaiṣṇavī bhakti-koṭiḥ /
GR14caitcanu:499: koṭy-aṃśo 'py asya na syāt tad api guṇa-gaṇo yaḥ svataḥ-siddha āste
GR14caitcanu:514: gaurāṅge nyasta-bhāvo yaḥ sarvārtha-pūrṇa eva saḥ //131// (30)
GR14caitcanu:517: dṛṣṭaṃ na śāstraṃ guravo na pṛṣṭā
GR14caitcanu:521: kecit sāgara-bhūdharān api parākrāmanti nṛtyanti vai
GR14caitcanu:524: ke kiṃ no kṛtavanta īdṛśi punaś caitanya-nṛtyotsave //134// (27)
GR14caitcanu:526: ye na majjanti majjanti te mahānartha-sāgare //135// (35)
GR14caitcanu:528: caitanya-candre prakaṭe yo dīno dīna eva saḥ //136// (36)
GR14caitcanu:531: muktibhyo mahatīṃ pumān na labhate tat-koṣa-bhūṣāṅkarīṃ
GR14caitcanu:534: tasyendro dāsavad bhāti kā kathā nṛpa-kīṭake //138// (96)
GR14caitcanu:536: cintāmaṇi-cayaṃ prāpya ko gūḍho rajataṃ vrajet //139// (97)
GR14caitcanu:542: evaṃ kair api na kṛtaṃ yat premābdhau nimajjitaṃ viśvam //141// (126)
GR14caitcanu:544: na tad api sa hi kaścic chakti-līlā-vikāśaḥ /
GR14caitcanu:551: acaitanyam idaṃ viśvaṃ yadi caitanyam īśvaram /
